word:
The character and prospects of the people of God are similar 
                                                                           407
to those of the Jews, who could not enter in because of unbelief. Self-sufficiency, self-importance, and spiritual pride separate them from God, and He hid His face from them. The apostle exhorts us, "If God spared not the natural branches, take heed lest he also spare not thee." "Because of unbelief, they were broken off, and thou standest by faith. Be not high minded, but fear."
